alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon; Juniata; Mifflin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HUNTINGDON... MIFFLIN AND NORTHWESTERN JUNIATA COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lewistown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Burnham, Belleville, Milroy, Highland Park, Yeagertown, Strodes Mills, Reedsville, Juniata Terrace, Allensville, Mexico, Alfarata, Reeds Gap State Park, Mcalevys Fort, Belltown, Walnut, Seven Mountains, Mifflintown, Port Royal and Mifflin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
